channel.title: How do i change stats and items on the body that new people have?
channel.description: how can i change start stats and items on them and etc?

item.title: How do i change stats and items on the body that new people have?
item.dc:creator: @iceyfang iceyfang
item.description:
@iceyfang wrote:

idk how to change starting stats, sorry.

but! i know how to changed starter equips.

open player.java in your source file.
hit ctrl f
type //giving the player
you should see:

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643; playerEquipment[playerCape]=14122; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=2591; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=2593; playerEquipment[playerHands]=6922; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=7114; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=7449;
Thats my starting armor, dont leech it. but you see, it explains itself. playerEquipment[playerHat]=2643 is a black cav. to make nothing appear in the item slot type a -1.

so if you dont want a hat the code would be:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change stats and items on the body that new people have?
